changelog.change: · Use code IKG30 at checkout with Stripe to get 30% off. Limited time offer, ends in 72 hours.
· Coupon valid for all purchases: YTKillerPlus, iNKillerPlus, and store subscriptions (license key renewals).
· Download up to 4K and HDR videos (Jailbreak only).
· Support for M4A and MP3 downloads added.
· Added 4K video and HDR support in the download manager.
· Added MP3 player and badge to download manager.
· Fixed AirPlay icon permission issue.
· Improved audio and video player layout constraints.
· Enhanced download manager performance.
· Fixed PNG artwork import issues in some cases.
· Faster backup loading and improved backup compression (20% smaller).
· Fixed icon layout for Shorts downloads and fullscreen mode.
· Improved layout constraints for smaller devices.
· Reduced delay time when long-pressing downloaded items.
· Enhanced download manager to handle more items smoothly.
· Updated and fixed missing localizations.
· Improved speed and playback controllers for overlay, with save status handling.
· Other fixes and improvements.
· For purchase guidelines and FAQs, visit: ikghd.site/faq.html
· Updated iPA to YouTube_v19.37.2.
